projects.title: Distributed Key-Value Store
projects.discription: Developed a distributed, fault-tolerant key-value store using Go, implementing concepts like replication and sharding to ensure availability and consistency. Optimized for low-latency data access.

projects.title: Parallelized Simplex Algorithm using Haskell
projects.discription: Developed a parallelized version of the Simplex Algorithm using Haskell for solving large-scale linear programming problems. Leveraged Haskell‚Äôs concurrency features to speed up the computation for large datasets.

projects.title: Hackvest
projects.discription: Hackvest is a machine learning based virtual farmer assistant. It is primarily an image-based plant disease prediction app trained using the plant village dataset. Pytorch is used in the Flask backend that serves as an API for image recognition. Additional features include predictions based on variables such as temperature and humidity using the OpenWeatherMap API. Built at BDU STEM Highschool.

projects.title: Swip3
projects.discription:
Spring 2022 NYC Lion DAO Crypto Hackathon (3rdüèÜ Place)
Project By: Hileamlak, Matt, and Bereket
E-commerce microtransactions are shifting to cryptocurrencies, and Swip3 introduces a Web3 credit card, offering per-payment loans. Users can leverage crypto for DApp payments with Swip3's extension and developer API.

projects.title: Verxion
projects.discription: Verxion is a reimplementation of the Git version control system. The project was built to understand the underlying data structure - merkle tree - in technologies like Git and blockchains. Written in Java, it includes many of the basic features found in Git.

projects.title: Columbia Course Rating
projects.discription: Columbia University Course Rating is a chrome extension that provides students easy access to course information during registration. This extension aggregates important details from multiple university websites using web scraping and displays them in a user-friendly interface. Built using Puppeteer for scraping.

projects.title: Personal Website
projects.discription: This is the personal website that you are viewing right now. It is still under development, with many features coming in the future. The design Figma file is also linked below. Feel free to clone any part of the design, but please reach out! üòâ

projects.title: Dijkstra Visual
projects.discription: Dijkstra Visual was a final assignment for COMS 3134 (Data Structures in Java) at Columbia University. It implements Dijkstra‚Äôs Algorithm and includes a graphical user interface to visualize the shortest path between multiple cities.
